data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If you face forward you always go forward. Forward is always towards the left. Correct instructions state to take 9 steps left and take 10 steps forward. Correct instructions state to take 9 steps right and take 10 steps backward. So, the answer is No.
